title: sound notification are always on, Keep deletes notes
content:
Dear support people,
I am super frustrated with my new Pixel 4a 5G. It is my company phone and seems to be totally untamable.

1) Google Calendar app is constantly sound notifying me even thought I have switched off all sound notifications in its settings
 - a few minutes ago I was notified with an event which was deleted hours ago and which even does not show up in this terrible app.
 - it is not possible to uninstall the app nor kill it. get rid of it. I really do not want to use the worst product you have created so far. the app gets weirdly synchronised with my work outlook account. I hope this can be switched off somewhere.

2) RESOLVED (was actually an issue of the Beng Olufsen Beoplay 2P speaker): when playing music over bluetooth the (yt music, Spotify) the playback stops randomly. incredible. this was reported by users over a year ago and still happens. 

3) Keep (Notes)
 this bloody app does not synch with my Google account. New notes created in the app got DELETED. I still do not understand how this is happening in the 21. century.


OVERALL RATING: WORST PHONE I HAVE EVER HAD BY FAR
(and I had about 10 so far). Switched from Apple just get into the Pixel NIGHTMARE.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
